intro: An innovative blend of Bullet Hell and Survival elements, high dynamics, variable builds, arena competition with players from around the world.
description:
Prepare to enter a world of epic battles, diverse characters, and an endless flow of action in Call of Sentinels! This fast-paced bullet hell arena shooter will test your reflexes and strategic skills as you fight your way through hordes of enemies and powerful bosses. 

Game features:
- Diverse builds. Experiment with different builds to find the one that suits you best and become a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.
- Powerful bosses. Prepare to face off against challenging bosses, each with their own unique mechanics and attacks.
- Epic characters and weapons. Unleash the power of a stunning arsenal of weapons and equip yourself with unique characters that bring their own flavor to the battlefield.
- Story mode.Embark on an epic journey through six beautifully crafted locations, each connected by a compelling story told through cutscenes and in-game dialogue.
- Trials of sentinels. During your battles, you'll encounter special challenging tasks that, once completed, will give you the opportunity to choose from a variety of additional upgrades!
- Hunders of skills. Master hundreds of skills and unlock powerful upgrades to craft your own unique build. Experiment with different combinations and build your character to dominate the battlefield!
